o: Recording and analyzing costs for management decisions

Cost not directly traceable to specific cost object

o: Sequential reapportionment closing departments one by one

o: Variance from using different material proportions

o: Variance from actual hours differing from standard
Variance from actual wage rate differing from standard

o: Variance from actual capacity differing from budgeted

q: Volume variance relates to capacity utilization.
